title: War Movies: Iraq: A Lesson Unlearned (Al-Jazeera) 2008 02 18 mpe
description:
War Movies: Iraq: A Lesson Unlearned (Al-Jazeera) 2008 02 18 mpeg

?In The Valley of Elah? is up for a major Oscar with an all-star cast including Tommy Lee Jones and Susan Sarandon. Other Hollywood films made money from American audiences.

But despite widespread disapproval of the Iraq War in the US, antiwar films just did not make it there. Is the message just too raw and harsh for Americans to learn? 

117 mgs 
22 minutes 


As
